meanings.definition: To prepare or cook something in the style of chowder.
meanings.sent1: She chowdered the seafood soup for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef chowdered the vegetables in a creamy broth.
meanings.sent3: After a mix-up in the kitchen, the salad was accidentally chowdered with clam chowder.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the chowdered stew filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The family enjoyed the chowdered meal on a cold winter evening.

meanings.sent1: The chowdered potatoes were a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent2: The fish was served with a side of chowdered corn.
meanings.sent3: The chowdered breadsticks added a unique twist to the meal.
meanings.sent4: The car was parked under a chowdered tree after the food festival.
meanings.sent5: The chowdered bowl glistened under the restaurant lights.
